mapper.insert: insert into tb_chatroom (talker_email, talker_nickname, listener_email, listener_nickname) values (#{talker_email}, #{talker_nickname}, #{listener_email}, #{listener_nickname})
mapper.select: select tb_chatroom.IDX, tb_chatroom.TALKER_EMAIL, tb_chatroom.TALKER_NICKNAME, tb_chatroom.LISTENER_EMAIL, tb_chatroom.LISTENER_NICKNAME, tb_talker.CONSULTING_TOPIC from tb_chatroom left outer join tb_talker on tb_chatroom.TALKER_EMAIL=tb_talker.EMAIL where (tb_chatroom.LISTENER_EMAIL = #{listener_email} && listener_response=0)
mapper.update: update tb_chatroom set listener_response=1 where idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: select * from tb_chatroom where listener_email=#{listener_email} and listener_response=1
